Question
========

A researcher has each participant perform a memory task under three experimental conditions, and she wants to know which condition gives the best results. Which analysis method is appropriate to answer this question?

  
Answerlist
----------
* Single regression
* Multiple regression
* One-way ANOVA
* Repeated measures ANOVA


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
